metadata.name: Love Is The Cure
metadata.description:
As an artist that has lived through a war, I still suffer from the horrors I experienced. I strongly believe that the only cure for such hatred is love.To love without prejudice, to respect all races, languages, and religions is vital for our children.The future leaders of the world must be nourished with admiration, curiosity and respect for all fellow men and women.This is the only way to prevent more tragedies in the history of mankind.
All proceeds from this NFT will be donated to Syrian refugee camps in Turkey
